title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheese, and black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup pasta water, then drain spaghetti.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the spice blend for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a large pan and sauté onion until golden.
Add garlic and remaining spices, cook for 1 minute.
Add chicken with marinade and cook until browned.
Stir in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add cream and simmer for 5 more minutes until sauce thickens.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Neapolitan-style pizza topped with fresh mozzarella and basil.
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C) with pizza stone if available.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a border.
Arrange mozzarella slices on top and drizzle with olive oil.
Transfer to oven and bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Remove from oven and immediately top with fresh basil leaves.
Let cool for 2 minutes, slice, and serve hot.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
summary: Quick stir-fried beef with colorful veggies.
steps: Toss beef with cornstarch and 1 tbsp soy sauce, let sit for 10 minutes.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat and stir-fry beef until browned. Remove.
Add remaining oil and stir-fry garlic for 30 seconds.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Return beef to wok, add remaining soy sauce and oyster sauce.
Toss everything together for 1-2 minutes until well coated.
Serve immediately over steamed rice.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, onions, and feta cheese.
steps: In a large bowl, combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over vegetables and toss gently to combine.
Top with feta cheese cubes.
Let salad sit for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Toss once more before serving.
Serve as a side dish or light main course.

title: Buttermilk Pancakes
summary: Fluffy golden pancakes with buttermilk.
steps: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk buttermilk, eggs, and melted butter.
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined (batter should be lumpy).
Heat a griddle or pan over medium heat and lightly grease.
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake and cook until bubbles form on surface.
Flip and cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve warm with butter and maple syrup.

title: Guacamole
summary: Avocado dip with lime, cilantro, and onion.
steps: Cut avocados in half, remove pits, and scoop flesh into a bowl.
Mash avocados with a fork to desired consistency (chunky or smooth).
Add lime juice and mix well to prevent browning.
Fold in onion, tomatoes, cilantro, jalapeño, and garlic.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Cover with plastic wrap pressed directly onto surface to prevent oxidation.
Serve with tortilla chips or as a topping for tacos.

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: Rice rolls filled with vegetables and seafood.
ingredients: Soy sauce and wasabi for serving
steps: Cook sushi rice according to package directions and let cool slightly.
Mix rice vinegar and sugar, then fold into warm rice.
Place nori sheet shiny-side down on bamboo mat.
Spread thin layer of rice over nori, leaving 1 inch at top.
Arrange fillings (cucumber, avocado, crab) in a line across the center.
Using the mat, roll tightly from bottom, sealing the top edge with water.
Slice into 6-8 pieces with a sharp wet knife and serve with soy sauce.

title: Vegetarian Chili
summary: Hearty bean chili simmered with warm spices.
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Sauté onion and bell peppers until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic, chili powder, and cumin; cook for 1 minute.
Add beans, tomatoes, and vegetable broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Stir occasionally and add water if chili becomes too thick.
Serve hot with toppings like sour cream, cheese, and cilantro.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, beat butter and both sugars until creamy.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Gradually stir in flour mixture until just combined.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets and bake for 9-11 minutes until golden. Cool on wire racks.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Garlicky butter shrimp tossed with pasta and lemon.
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions; reserve 1 cup pasta water.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add shrimp, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 2 minutes per side. Remove.
In the same pan, add butter and garlic; sauté for 1 minute.
Add white wine and lemon juice; simmer for 3 minutes.
Return shrimp to pan, add pasta and toss, adding pasta water as needed.
Garnish with parsley and red pepper flakes. Serve immediately.

title: Pad Thai
summary: Stir-fried rice noodles with tamarind sauce, tofu, and peanuts.
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, then drain.
Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and brown sugar to make sauce.
Heat oil in a wok and fry tofu until golden. Remove.
Scramble eggs in the wok, then add garlic.
Add noodles and sauce, toss for 2-3 minutes.
Add tofu, bean sprouts, and half the peanuts and green onions.
Serve topped with remaining peanuts, green onions, and lime wedges.

title: Ratatouille
summary: Provencal vegetable stew of eggplant, zucchini, peppers, and tomatoes.
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Sauté onion until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add eggplant and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add zucchini and bell peppers; cook for 5 more minutes.
Add tomatoes, basil, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Simmer uncovered for 20-25 minutes until vegetables are tender. Serve warm or at room temperature.

title: Caprese Salad
summary: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with olive oil.
steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a serving platter, alternating and overlapping.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle olive oil evenly over the salad.
Drizzle balsamic glaze in a decorative pattern.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Let sit for 5 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Serve at room temperature as an appetizer or side dish.

title: Falafel
summary: Crispy chickpea fritters served with tahini and fresh salad.
steps: In a food processor, combine chickpeas, onion, garlic, herbs, and spices.
Pulse until mixture is coarse but holds together when pressed.
Transfer to a bowl and stir in flour. Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Form mixture into small patties or balls.
Heat oil in a deep pan to 350°F (175°C).
Fry falafel in batches for 3-4 minutes until golden brown.
Drain on paper towels and serve with tahini sauce and pita bread.

title: Blueberry Muffins
summary: Soft muffins bursting with fresh blueberries.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a muffin tin with paper liners.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk oil, egg, milk, and vanilla.
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Gently fold in blueberries.
Divide batter among muffin cups, filling each about 2/3 full.
Bake for 18-20 minutes until golden and a toothpick comes out clean. Cool before serving.

title: Quinoa Salad
summary: Zesty quinoa tossed with veggies and a lemon vinaigrette.
steps: Rinse quinoa under cold water in a fine-mesh strainer.
Combine quinoa and water in a pot; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes until water is absorbed.
Fluff with a fork and let cool completely.
In a large bowl, combine cooled quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, onion, and parsley.
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, lemon zest, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad, toss well, and serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Apple Pie
summary: Classic spiced apple filling in a flaky crust.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Line a 9-inch pie dish with one crust.
In a large bowl, toss apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice.
Pour apple mixture into crust and dot with butter.
Cover with second crust, seal edges, and cut slits in the top.
Brush with beaten egg and sprinkle with sugar.
Bake for 50-60 minutes until crust is golden and filling is bubbly. Cool before slicing.

title: Burrito Bowl
summary: Rice, beans, veggies, and your choice of protein with salsa.
steps: Prepare rice according to package directions and season with lime juice.
Warm black beans in a small pot with a pinch of cumin.
Sauté bell peppers in a skillet until tender.
Assemble bowls by dividing rice among serving bowls.
Top each bowl with beans, corn, peppers, and lettuce.
Add avocado slices, salsa, and a dollop of sour cream.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with lime wedges.

title: Lasagna
summary: Layered pasta with rich meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and cook lasagna noodles according to package directions.
Brown ground beef with garlic, then stir in marinara sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
In a bowl, mix ricotta, egg, half the mozzarella, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Spread a thin layer of meat sauce in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Layer 4 noodles, half the ricotta mixture, and 1/3 of remaining meat sauce. Repeat.
Top with final layer of noodles, remaining sauce, mozzarella, and Parmesan.
Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes, then uncover and bake 15 more minutes until bubbly. Let rest 10 minutes before serving.
